Detailed Description

A simple container class for images.

Images are implicitly shared, meaning that copied images point to the same pixel data.

Chronicle::Image::Image ( HBITMAP  bitmap)

Constructs an image from an HBITMAP handle.

Note
This function takes ownership of the HBITMAP handle.
Warning
This function is only available on Windows.
